results.name: Inverse permutation to A071651.
link: Antti Karttunen, Rows n=0..66 of triangle, flattened
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (Scheme functions below show the essential idea. For a complete source, see the "Alternative Catalan Orderings" OEIS Wiki page.)
(define (unrank-bintree rank pr1 pr2) (cond ((zero? rank) (list)) (else (cons (unrank-bintree (pr1 (-1+ rank)) pr1 pr2) (unrank-bintree (pr2 (-1+ rank)) pr1 pr2)))))
xref: Inverse permutation: A071651. A071671 gives the corresponding parenthesizations (from the term 1 onward) encoded as binary numbers, i.e. A071671(n) = A063171(A071652(n)) for n >= 1.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 30 2002
